lead_paragraph: Tesla said that it was recalling the sport utility vehicles after testing revealed that the backs of the third-row seats could give way in a crash.

headline.print_headline: Tesla Recall Is Ordered for S.U.V.s

snippet: Tesla said that it was recalling the sport utility vehicles after testing revealed that the backs of the third-row seats could give way in a crash.
abstract: Tesla Motors announces recall of Model X sport utility vehicles after testing shows backs of electric car's third-row seats could collapse in crash.
